title: Nepal mayor's daughter, Osho follower Aarti Hamal goes missing in Goa. Details here - Business Today
description: Nepal mayor's daughter, Osho follower Aarti Hamal goes missing in Goa. Details here  Business Today
publisher.title: Business Today
full_article:
Aarti Hamal, the daughter of Gopal Hamal, mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city in Nepal, has reportedly gone missing in Goa. Aarti, known to be a follower of Osho meditation, had been residing in Goa for several months. She was last seen near Ashvem Bridge on Monday evening.

Gopal Hamal took to social media appealing for assistance in locating his daughter. Aarti's sister, Arzoo Hamal, and her husband are en route to Goa to join the search, he said.

"My elder daughter, Aarti, is an Osho meditator who has been living in Goa for a few months. However, I have received a message from her friend stating that she has lost contact with Aarti Zorba Vibes Ashwem Breeze since yesterday. I humbly request that those who live in Goa assist in the search for my daughter, Aarti," he posted on X.

He added: "Also, my younger daughter Aarzoo and son-in-law are flying to Goa tonight to look for our elder daughter Aarti". The family has provided contact numbers to aid in the search.

Arzoo, in a social media post, mentioned they received numerous calls with information about possible sightings of Aarti near a bridge in Siolim. "“We have received more than 500 calls since we left from Nepal to Lucknow. We are still getting calls even post 12:00am. Some of the people have been very helpful and we are eternally grateful to them," she said in her post.

Some callers suggested she was taken to a hospital after being found unconscious, while others believed she was taken to a police station. She added: “Our well-wishers who have reached out and are trying to help have been looking in hospitals and police stations in and around that area. But nothing has really been clear so far. ”

No clear information has been established yet. Arzoo also confirmed that a First Information Report (FIR) has been filed with the Goa Police in relation to the case.
translated: खबर अछि जे नेपाल के धनगाधी उप-मेट्रोपोलिटन शहर के मेयर गोपाल हमल के बेटी आर्टी हमल गोवा मे लापता भ गेल छथिन्ह.ओशो ध्यान के अनुयायी के रूप में जानल जाय वाला आर्टी गोवा में कई महीना स निवास क रहल छल।अंतिम बेर सोमदिन साँझ मे अश्वेम ब्रिज के पास देखल गेल छल।गोपाल हमल अपन बेटी के पता लगेबा मे सहयोग के अपील करैत सोशल मीडिया पर उतरलाह।ओ कहलनि जे, आर्टी के बहिन अर्जू हमल आ हुनकर पति खोज मे शामिल होबय लेल गोवा के रास्ता मे छथि।"हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी, आर्टी, एगो ओशो मेडिटेटर छै जे कुछ महीना स॑ गोवा म॑ रह॑ लगलऽ छै । लेकिन हमरा हुनकऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो संदेश मिललऽ छै कि हुनी काल्हि स॑ ही आर्टी ज़ोरबा वाइब्स अश्वेम ब्रीज स॑ संपर्क नै होय गेलऽ छै । हम्म॑ विनम्रतापूर्वक आग्रह करल॑ छियै । कि जे लोग गोवा में रह॑ छै, वू हमरऽ बेटी, आर्टी के खोज में सहायता करै छै," हुनी एक्स पर पोस्ट करलकै. हुनी आरू कहलकै, "संगहि, हमरऽ छोटऽ बेटी आर्जू आरू जमाय आय रात गोवा के लेलऽ उड़ै छै हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी आर्टी के खोजै लेली आर्टी "।परिवार खोज मे सहायता करबाक लेल संपर्क नंबर उपलब्ध करौलक अछि।अरज़ू, एक सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट म॑ उल्लेख करलकै कि ओकरा सिओलिम केरऽ एगो पुल के पास एर्टी के संभावित दर्शन के बारे म॑ जानकारी के साथ अनेक कॉल मिललै ।ओ अपन पोस्ट मे ओ अपन पोस्ट मे कहलीह जे, "जहिया स हम नेपाल स लखनऊ गेल छलहुं, हमरा सब कए 500 स बेसी कॉल भेटल अछि। हमरा सब कए एखनो 12:00 बजे क बाद सेहो फोन आबि रहल अछि। किछु लोक बहुत मददगार रहल छथि आ हम सब हुनका सब कए अनन्त आभारी छी। के .किछु फोन करय वाला के सुझाव छल जे हुनका बेहोश भेटला के बाद अस्पताल ल गेल गेल छल, जखन कि किछ के माननाय छल जे हुनका थाना ल गेल गेल.हुनी आरू कहलकै, “हमरौ अच्छा अलिश करै वाला लोगौ नँ हाथ बढ़ाबै वाला आरू मदद करै के कोशिश करी रहलौ छै कि वू क्षेत्र मँ आरू आसपास के अस्पताल आरू थाना मँ देखै छै ।मुदा एखन धरि सचमुच किछु स्पष्ट नहि भेल अछि।” एखन धरि कोनो स्पष्ट जानकारी स्थापित नहि भेल अछि ।अर्जू न॑ ई भी पुष्टि करलकै कि ई मामला के संबंध म॑ गोवा पुलिस म॑ एगो पहिलऽ सूचना रिपोर्ट (एफआईआर) दायर करलऽ गेलऽ छै ।

title: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Missing From Goa, Search Operation Launched To Find Aarti Hamal - Times Now
description: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Missing From Goa, Search Operation Launched To Find Aarti Hamal  Times Now
publisher.title: Times Now
full_article:
Nepal Mayor's Daughter Missing From Goa, Search Operation Launched To Find Aarti Hamal

Panaji: Aarti Hamal , the daughter of Nepal's Mayor Gopal Hamal , has gone missing, The 36-year-old Nepalese woman was last seen near Ashvem Bridge in Goa . Goa Police have launched a search operation to find the missing woman.

Aarti, who has been in Goa for the past few months was last seen on Holi Monday near the Ashvem Area. During her time in Goa, Aarti is believed to have been staying at Osho Meditation Centre.

Gopal Hamal, the mayor of the Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city in Nepal reached out on social media for assistance to find his daughter.

Taking to social media platforms X and Facebook, the Nepalese Mayor wrote that his daughter Arzoo and her husband will be flying to Goa to look for Aarti.

"I sincerely request that you contact 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 to provide the necessary assistance in the search for my daughter," he wrote on X. After a missing person report was filed, the police are conducting an operation to find Aarti.
translated: नेपाल मेयर के बेटी गोवा सं गायब, आर्टी हमल पनाजी के खोजय लेल लॉन्च भेल छल: नेपाल के मेयर गोपाल हमल के बेटी आर्टी हमल के लापता भ गेल अछि, जे 36 वर्षीय नेपाली महिला के गोवा के अशवेम ब्रिज के पास अंतिम बेर देखल गेल छल .गोवा पुलिस के लापता महिला के खोजय लेल सर्च ऑपरेशन शुरू कएल गेल अछि.पिछला किछु मास स गोवा मे छथि आर्टी कए अंतिम बेर होली सोमदिन अश्वेम इलाका क समीप देखल गेल छल।गोवा म॑ अपनऽ समय के दौरान आर्टी ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर म॑ ठहरलऽ छेलै ।नेपाल केरऽ धनगाधी उप-मौलतन शहर केरऽ मेयर गोपाल हमल न॑ अपनऽ बेटी क॑ खोजै लेली सहायता लेली सोशल मीडिया प॑ हाथ बढ़ैलकै ।सोशल मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म एक्स आरू फेसबुक प॑ जाय क॑ नेपाली मेयर न॑ लिखलकै कि हुनकऽ बेटी आर्जू आरू हुनकऽ पति आर्टी के खोज करै लेली गोवा के तरफ उड़ै वाला छै ।"हमर बेटी के खोज में आवश्यक सहायता प्रदान करय लेल 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 सं संपर्क करय के ईमानदारी सं आग्रह करैत छी.. एकटा लापता व्यक्ति के रिपोर्ट दाखिल करय के बाद ओ लिखने छलाह.

title: Nepal mayor's daughter, a follower of Osho meditation, missing in Goa - Firstpost
description: Nepal mayor's daughter, a follower of Osho meditation, missing in Goa  Firstpost
publisher.title: Firstpost
full_article:
Gopal Hamal, mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city and Aarti’s father, took to social media platform X seeking help in finding his elder daughter

Aarti Hamal, a follower of Osho meditation, was last seen on Monday (March 25) around 9:30 pm in the vicinity of Ashvem Bridge in the Pernem taluka. X/@GopalHamal7

The 36-year-old daughter of the mayor of Nepal’s Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city has gone missing in Goa, where she was residing for the past few months.

Aarti Hamal, a follower of Osho meditation, was last seen on Monday (March 25) around 9:30 pm in the vicinity of Ashvem Bridge in the Pernem taluka.

Advertisement

Aarti, who goes by the name Artusha Hamal Dhyan Leela on social media Facebook, had been associated with the Osho Meditation Centre for the past few months, reports in Nepalese newspapers said.

How did Nepal mayor learn about his daughter going missing?

Gopal Hamal, mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city and Aarti’s father, took to social media platform X seeking help in finding his elder daughter.

The mayor said Aarti’s friend informed him about her missing, saying she had lost contact with Aarti Zorba Vibes Ashwem Breeze.

“My elder daughter, Aarti, is an Osho meditator who has been living in Goa for a few months. However, I have received a message from her friend stating that she has lost contact with Aarti Zorba Vibes Ashwem Breeze since yesterday (March 25). I humbly request that those who live in Goa assist in the search for my daughter, Aarti,” Gopal Hamal’s post on X read.

Advertisement

The mayor of Nepal’s Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city further informed that his younger daughter Arzoo Hamal and son-in-law were flying to Goa to look for Aarti.

“I sincerely request that you contact 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 to provide the necessary assistance in the search for my daughter,” Gopal Hamal posted on X.

Advertisement

Aarti was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim

Aarti’s younger sibling Arzoo Hamal in a post on Facebook said according to some callers, her sister was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim.

“We have received more than 500 calls since we left from Nepal to Lucknow. We are still getting calls even post 12:00 am. Some of the people have been very helpful and we are eternally grateful to them. According to some callers she was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim. Few of them believe that she was taken to a hospital from there in an ambulance as she was found unconscious while the others have been saying that she was taken to the police station.”

Advertisement

“Our well-wishers who have reached out and are trying to help have been looking in hospitals and police stations in and around that area. But nothing has really been clear so far," Arzoo added.

Search begins for Nepal mayor’s missing daughter

Goa Police have registered a missing person’s complaint. She has been reported missing since March 25. A search team has been constituted to find Aarti.

Advertisement

Search for Aarti intensified after sources said she could not be located in the early searches carried out across hospitals in the region.

With inputs from agencies

पोस्ट.विज्ञापन नेपाल केरऽ धनगाधी उप-मेट्रोपोलिटन सिटी केरऽ मेयर न॑ आरू सूचित करलकै कि हुनकऽ छोटऽ बेटी आर्जू हमल आरू जमाय आर्टी के खोज करै लेली गोवा के पास उड़ै छै ।“हम ईमानदारी स॑ आग्रह करै छियै कि आपने 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 स॑ संपर्क करी क॑ हमरऽ बेटी केरऽ खोज म॑ आवश्यक सहायता प्रदान करै । फेसबुक कहलनि जे किछु फोन करय वाला के अनुसार हुनकर बहिन के अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल.ओ कहला जे जहिया स हम सब नेपाल स लखनऊ गेल रही तहिया स हमरा सब कए 500 स बेसी फोन आयल अछि।हमरा सब के एखनो 12:00 बजे पोस्ट तक कॉल भेट रहल अछि।किछु लोक बहुत मददगार रहल छथि आ हम सब हुनका सब के अनन्त आभारी छी।किछु फोन करय वाला के अनुसार हुनका अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल.किछुए गोटे मानैत छथि जे हुनका एम्बुलेंस मे एकटा अस्पताल ल' गेल गेलनि कारण हुनका बेहोश भेटलनि जखन कि आन लोकनि कहैत रहलाह अछि जे हुनका थाना ल' गेल गेलनि.”विज्ञापन “हमरऽ सुसज्जनकर्ता जे हाथ बढ़ाय क॑ मदद करै के कोशिश करी रहलऽ छै, वू क्षेत्र म॑ आरू आसपास अस्पताल आरू थाना म॑ देखै वाला होय रहलऽ छै ।लेकिन अभी तलक वास्तव में कुछ स्पष्ट नै होय सकलऽ छै," आर्जू न॑ आरू कहलकै । सूत्रक कहल गेल छल जे ओ क्षेत्रक अस्पतालक पार कयल गेल प्रारंभिक खोज मे नहि भ' सकैत अछि, ताहि लेल आर्टी तेज भ' गेल.एजेंसी

title: Nepal suffers defeat to Bahrain again - Myrepublica
description: Nepal suffers defeat to Bahrain again  Myrepublica
publisher.title: Myrepublica
full_article:
KATHMANDU, March 27: Nepal has lost to Bahrain in the fourth match of the second phase of the qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup-2026 and AFC Asia Cup-2027.

In the match played today at the Riffa-based National Stadium this morning, Bahrain defeated Nepal 3-0.

Strikers Syed Wakar, Abdulla Yusuf and Komail Al Aswad scored one goal each to take Bahrain to the lead.

This is Nepal's fourth consecutive defeat in Group 'H'. Earlier, Nepal had lost to Bahrain 5-0 in the match held in Bahrain on March 21. Nepal had also suffered a 0-4 defeat to the UAE and lost 0-2 to Yemen.

Nepal is in the last place in the group with no points in four matches, while the UAE tops the group with 12 points. Bahrain is placed second with nine points while Yemen is third with three points.

Nepal will now face the UAE and Yemen in the remaining two matches of the qualifiers.
translated: काठमांडू, २७ मार्च : नेपाल न॑ फीफा विश्व कप-२०२६ आरू एएफसी एशिया कप-२०२७ लेली क्वालीफायर केरऽ दोसरऽ चरण केरऽ चारिम मैच म॑ बहरीन स॑ हारलऽ छै ।आय भोरे रिफा स्थित राष्ट्रीय स्टेडियम में खेललौ गेलौ मैच मँ बहरीन नँ नेपाल क ३-० स॑ हराबै के मौका मिललै ।स्ट्राइकर सैयद वकार, अब्दुल्ला यूसुफ आरू कोमेल अल असवद न॑ एक-एक गोल करी क॑ बहरीन क॑ बढ़त बनाबै के कोशिश करलकै ।नेपाल केरऽ ई समूह ‘एच’ म॑ लगातार चारिम हार छेकै ।एहि सं पहिने नेपाल 21 मार्च के बहरीन मे आयोजित मैच मे बहरीन सं 5-0 सं हारल छलाह.नेपाल के सेहो यूएई सं 0-4 सं हारल छल आ यमन सं 0-2 सं हारल छल.नेपाल समूह केरऽ आखिरी स्थान प॑ छै आरू ओकरा म॑ चार मैचऽ म॑ कोनो अंक नै छै, जबकि यूएई १२ अंक के साथ समूह प॑ शीर्ष पर छै ।बहरीन क॑ नौ अंक के साथ दूसरऽ स्थान प॑ रखलऽ गेलऽ छै जबकि यमन तीन अंक के साथ तीसरा स्थान प॑ छै ।क्वालीफायर केरऽ शेष दू मैचऽ म॑ अब॑ नेपाल के सामना यूएई आरू यमन स॑ होतै ।

title: AmCham Nepal hosts ‘Expert Learning Series’ at SecurityPal - Myrepublica
description: AmCham Nepal hosts ‘Expert Learning Series’ at SecurityPal  Myrepublica
publisher.title: Myrepublica
full_article:
KATHMANDU, March 27: The American Chamber of Commerce in Nepal (AmCham Nepal), the umbrella organization of American-invested businesses in Nepal, has completed the 'Expert Learning Series' program at its member SecurityPal.

During the event, Ruth Rafalovich, the Vice President of SecurityPal's Business Development Partnership, informed AmCham members about SecurityPal's services in Nepal. SecurityPal is a cyber-security company founded by Pukar Chandra Hamal, an American Entrepreneur with Nepali origin. The US Silicon Valley cybersecurity company 'SecurityPal' has been operating in Nepal since Falgun 2079 BS.

Hamal mentioned that SecurityPal will help deal with security complexities and review how to protect sensitive data while exchanging services between companies with different business details.

Similarly, SecurityPal emphasized the need to invest in schools and create a situation where students who have studied there can be employed by SecurityPal in the future.

Team Daya founder Jay Sears who was invited to interact in the program, recalled the support provided by SecurityPal when he had come from America to establish a school in Kanchanpur, Nepal. He mentioned that while building a school in Kanchanpur, various company founders and officials of diplomatic missions also participated as volunteers. He expressed his happiness in building the school and fulfilling his dream since coming to Nepal to study for a semester at the age of 21.

Fifty people, including Aakash Golchha, Manish Thapa, Sneha Rajbhandari, Amir Raj Thapa, and representatives from the US Embassy, Laura Simkiss and Kate Kaetzer-Hudson, participated in the program from AmCham Nepal. More than 50 business organizations of American investment in Nepal have joined AmCham Nepal. Within two years of its establishment, it’s affiliated with the US Chamber of Commerce.

According to the organization, the purpose of this organization is to increase trade and investment between the two countries, focusing on foreign direct investment (FDI) for Nepal in tourism, information technology, and energy sectors.
translated: काठमांडू, 27 मार्च : नेपाल म॑ अमेरिकी-निवेशित व्यवसाय केरऽ छत्र संगठन नेपाल (एम्चम नेपाल म॑ अमेरिकी व्यापार मंडल न॑ अपनऽ सदस्य सुरक्षापाल म॑ ‘विशेषज्ञ लर्निंग सीरीज’ कार्यक्रम क॑ पूरा करी लेल॑ छै ।ई आयोजन के दौरान सुरक्षापाल केरऽ बिजनेस डेवलपमेंट पार्टनरशिप केरऽ उपाध्यक्ष रूथ राफालोविच न॑ अचैम केरऽ सदस्यऽ क॑ नेपाल म॑ सुरक्षापाल केरऽ सेवा के बारे म॑ जानकारी देलकै ।सुरक्षापाल नेपाली मूल के साथ एक अमेरिकी उद्यमी पुकर चंद्र हमल द्वारा स्थापित एक साइबर-सुरक्षा कंपनी छै.अमेरिकी सिलिकॉन वैली साइबरसुरक्षा कंपनी ‘सुरक्षापाल’ नेपाल में फैगुन 2079 बीएस के बाद सं संचालित अछि.हमल न॑ उल्लेख करलकै कि सुरक्षापाल सुरक्षा जटिलता स॑ निपटै म॑ मदद करतै आरू अलग-अलग व्यवसायिक विवरण वाला कंपनी सिनी के बीच सेवा के आदान-प्रदान करतें हुअ॑ संवेदनशील डाटा के सुरक्षा केना करलऽ जाय छै ओकरऽ समीक्षा करतै ।तहिना सुरक्षापाल न॑ स्कूलऽ म॑ निवेश करै के जरूरत प॑ जोर देलकै आरू ऐन्हऽ स्थिति बनाबै के जरूरत छै, जेकरा म॑ जे छात्र वहाँ के अध्ययन करलकै, वू भविष्य म॑ सुरक्षापाल द्वारा नियोजित करलऽ जाय सकै छै ।टीम दया केरऽ संस्थापक जे सियर्स क॑ ई कार्यक्रम म॑ बातचीत करै लेली आमंत्रित करलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, सुरक्षापाल द्वारा उपलब्ध कराय देलऽ गेलऽ समर्थन क॑ याद करलकै जब॑ हुनी अमेरिका स॑ ऐलऽ छेलै कि नेपाल केरऽ कनचपुर म॑ एगो स्कूल स्थापित करलऽ जाय ।हुनी कहलकै कि कंचपुर मँ स्कूल के निर्माण करतें हुअय कंपनी के विभिन्न संस्थापक आरू कूटनीतिक मिशन के अधिकारी भी स्वयंसेवक के रूप मँ भाग लेलकै ।21 साल के उम्र में एक सेमेस्टर के लेल पढ़ाई के लेल नेपाल आबि क स्कूल के निर्माण आ अपन सपना के पूरा करय में अपन खुशी व्यक्त केलनि।अकाश गोलच, मनीष थापा, स्नेहा राज भंडारी, अमीर राज थापा आ अमेरिकी दूतावास के प्रतिनिधि सहित पचास गोटे। , लौरा सिमकिस आ केट काट्ज़र-हडसन, अचम नेपाल सँ एहि कार्यक्रम मे भाग लेलनि ।नेपाल मे अमेरिकन इन्वेस्टमेंट के 50 सं बेसि बिजनेस ऑर्गेनाइजेशन अचम नेपाल सं जुड़ल अछि.एकरऽ स्थापना के दू साल के भीतर ई अमेरिकी वाणिज्य मंडल स॑ जुड़लऽ छै ।संगठन के अनुसार, ई संगठन के उद्देश्य पर्यटन, सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी, आरू ऊर्जा क्षेत्रऽ म॑ नेपाल लेली विदेशी प्रत्यक्ष निवेश (एफडीआई) प॑ केंद्रित छै, ई संगठन के उद्देश्य छै ।

title: Nepal Mayor's daughter goes missing from Goa, 'found safely in Goa' - Moneycontrol
description: Nepal Mayor's daughter goes missing from Goa, 'found safely in Goa'  Moneycontrol
publisher.title: Moneycontrol
full_article:
Nepal Mayor's daughter goes missing

A 36-year-old Nepali lady, the daughter of a mayor in India's bordering country, who went missing on Monday has been discovered, according to authorities. Authorities say she was recovered at a hotel in Mandrem, North Goa.

Her father, Gopal Hamal, stated that his eldest daughter Aarti had been missing since Monday, prompting Goa police to file a case and initiate a search operation.

Story continues below Advertisement Remove Ad

Aarti had been associated with the Osho Meditation Centre during her time in Goa. Her father, Gopal Hamal, the mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city, took to social media seeking assistance in finding his daughter. He mentioned that Aarti's friend notified the family about her disappearance.

Gopal Hamal requested those residing in Goa to help locate his daughter and shared contact numbers for assistance. He mentioned that his younger daughter Arzoo and son-in-law were flying to Goa to aid in the search.

"Also, my younger daughter Arzoo and son-in-law are flying to Goa tonight to look for our elder daughter Aarti," he added. He also shared these cell phone numbers on social media. "I sincerely request that you contact 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 to provide the necessary assistance in the search for my daughter," he wrote on X.

The Goa Police has initiated a search operation upon receiving a missing person's complaint. Efforts are underway to locate Aarti Hamal and ensure her safe return.
translated: नेपाल के मेयर के बेटी भारत के सीमावर्ती देश के एकटा मेयर के बेटी 36 वर्षीय नेपाली महिला के लापता भ गेल अछि, जे सोमदिन लापता भ गेल छल, के पता चलल अछि.अधिकारि के कहनाय छनि जे नॉर्थ गोवा के मंडरेम के एकटा होटल मे हुनका बरामद कएल गेल छल.हुनकऽ पिता गोपाल हमल न॑ कहलकै कि हुनकऽ जेठ बेटी आर्टी सोमवार स॑ ही लापता छेलै, जेकरा स॑ गोवा पुलिस न॑ केस दाखिल करी क॑ सर्च ऑपरेशन शुरू करी देलकै ।कथा जारी अछि विज्ञापन हटाउ एड आर्टी गोवा में अपन समय के दौरान ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर सं जुड़ल छल.हुनकऽ पिता धंगधी उप-महानगर शहर केरऽ मेयर गोपाल हमल न॑ अपनऽ बेटी क॑ खोजै म॑ सहायता मांगै वाला सोशल मीडिया प॑ उतरी गेलै ।ओ कहलनि जे आर्टी के दोस्त परिवार के ओकर गायब होय के बारे में सूचित केलक।गोपाल हमल गोवा में निवास करय वाला लोकनि सं आग्रह केलनि जे ओ अपन बेटीक पता लगाबय में मदद करथि आ सहायताक लेल संपर्क नंबर साझा करथि.ओ कहलनि जे हुनकर छोट बेटी आर्जू आ जमाय खोज मे सहायता करबाक लेल गोवा दिस उड़ि रहल छल।ओ आगू कहलनि जे, संगहि हमर छोट बेटी अर्जू आ जमाय आइ राति गोवा के लेल उड़ि रहल छथि जे हमर पैघ बेटी आर्टी के तलाश मे छथि।ओ सोशल मीडिया पर सेहो ई सेल फोन नंबर शेयर केलनि।"हम ईमानदारी स॑ आग्रह करै छियै कि आपने 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 स॑ संपर्क करी क॑ हमरऽ बेटी केरऽ खोज म॑ आवश्यक सहायता प्रदान करै ।आर्टी हमल के पता लगाबय आ ओकर सुरक्षित वापसी सुनिश्चित करय के प्रयास चलि रहल अछि.

title: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Who Went Missing In Goa Found - ABP Live
description: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Who Went Missing In Goa Found  ABP Live
publisher.title: ABP Live
full_article:
Aarti Hamal, the daughter of Nepal mayor Gopal Hamal who went missing in Goa has been found, said the Mayor in a Facebook post on Wednesday.

Aarti, 36 had gone missing while at an Osho meditation centre at Ashvem in the Pernem taluka. A missing person's complaint was registered by the Goa Police which began a search operation to locate Aarti who is the daughter of Nepal's Dhanigadhi municipality Mayor.

"I would like to inform all the well-wishers that my eldest daughter Aarti has been found safe and sound in Goa due to everyone's search efforts," said the Mayor in his Facebook post.

Earlier, Hamal had taken to social media platform X to inform about her missing daughter.

"My elder daughter, Aarti, is an Osho meditator who has been living in Goa for a few months. However, I have received a message from her friend stating that she has lost contact with Aarti Zorba Vibes Ashwem Breeze since yesterday," said Gopal Hamal, requesting those who live in Goa to assist in the search for her daughter.

He also said that his younger daughter Arzoo, and her husband would fly to Goa to search for his elder daughter and shared phone numbers to contact in the post.

"I sincerely request that you contact 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 to provide the necessary assistance in the search for my daughter," he said.

Arzoo also took to Facebook saying that she is flying to Goa to search for her sister.

"All my friends and family. I humbly request that you all not reach out to me today, as I am on my way to Goa to find my sister, I will only reach there tomorrow morning. I will be taking a flight from Lucknow to Goa," her post read.

The meditation centre's manager, Anand Prem Katipal lodged the missing person's complaint, said Pernem Deputy Superintendent of Police Jivba Dalvi, according to a Times of India report. Aarti, who goes by the names Leela and Artusha has been reported missing since March 25, as per the report.
translated: गोवा में लापता भेल नेपाल मेयर गोपाल हमल के बेटी आर्टी हमल बुधदिन फेसबुक पोस्ट में मेयर कहलनि।36, 36 पर्नेम तालुका के अश्वेम में ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर में रहैत लापता भ गेल छल.एकटा लापता व्यक्ति के शिकायत गोवा पुलिस द्वारा पंजीकृत छल जे नेपाल के धनिगधी नगरपालिका के मेयर के बेटी आर्टी के पता लगाबय लेल खोज अभियान शुरू केलक.अपनऽ फेसबुक पोस्ट म॑ मेयर न॑ कहलकै कि हम्में सब क॑ सब क॑ सूचित करना चाहै छियै कि हमरऽ जेठ बेटी आर्टी क॑ गोवा म॑ सुरक्षित आरू ध्वनि के प्रयास के वजह स॑ सुरक्षित मिललऽ छै ।एहि सं पहिने हमल अपन गायब बेटी के बारे मे जानकारी देबय लेल सोशल मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म एक्स मे आबि गेल छलाह.गोपाल नँ कहलकै, "हमरौ बड़का बेटी, आर्टी, एगो ओशो मेडिटेटर छै जे कुछ महीना स॑ गोवा म॑ रह॑ लगलऽ छै । हालांकि, हमरा हुनकऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो संदेश मिललऽ छै कि काल्हि स॑ ही हुनी आर्टी ज़ोरबा वाइब्स अश्वेम ब्रीज स॑ संपर्क खो गेलऽ छै ।" हमल अपन बेटी के खोज में सहायता के लेल गोवा में रहय वाला लोक सं आग्रह केलनि.ओ इहो कहलनि जे हुनकर छोट बेटी आर्जू, आ हुनकर पति अपन पैघ बेटी के खोजय लेल गोवा उड़ान भरताह आ पोस्ट मे संपर्क करय लेल फोन नंबर शेयर करताह.ओ कहलनि जे, हम ईमानदारी स आग्रह करैत छी जे अहां हमर बेटी के खोज मे आवश्यक सहायता प्रदान करय लेल 9794096014 / 8273538132 / 9389607953 सं संपर्क करू।आर्जू फेसबुक पर सेहो कहलक जे ओ अपन बहिन के खोजय लेल गोवा के उड़ान भरैत अछि."हमर सब दोस्त आओर परिवार. हम विनम्रतापूर्वक आग्रह करैत छी जे अहाँ सब आइ हमरा लग नहि पहुँचब, जेना हम अपन बहिन केँ खोजबाक लेल गोवा जेबाक लेल जा रहल छी, हम काल्हि भोरे मात्र ओतय पहुँचब. हम लखनऊ सँ फ्लाइट लेब गोवा," हुनकर पोस्ट मे पढ़ल गेल।भारत केरऽ एगो रिपोर्ट के अनुसार, ध्यान केंद्र केरऽ प्रबंधक आनंद प्रम कटिपल न॑ लापता व्यक्ति केरऽ शिकायत दर्ज करलकै ।रिपोर्ट के अनुसार लीला आरू आर्टुशा नाम के नाम स॑ जाय वाला आर्टी केरऽ रिपोर्ट के अनुसार, 25 मार्च स॑ ही लापता होय के खबर छै ।

title: Missing for 48 Hours, Nepal Mayor's Daughter Aarti Hamal Found In Goa In 'Weak Condition' - Times Now
description: Missing for 48 Hours, Nepal Mayor's Daughter Aarti Hamal Found In Goa In 'Weak Condition'  Times Now
publisher.title: Times Now
full_article:
Missing for 48 Hours, Nepal Mayor's Daughter Aarti Hamal Found In Goa In 'Weak Condition'

Panaji: Aarti Hamal, the daughter of Goapl Hamal, a mayor in Nepal has been found. The 36-year-old Nepalese woman had been missing since Monday. Sharing an update on Facebook, the Nepal Mayor shared she has been found but is in a "weak condition".

Reaching out on Facebook, the Nepalese Mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city confirmed that his daughter has been found but is in a "weak condition".

"I express my gratitude to all the people who helped in the search work, along with the helpful Nepali brothers and sisters living in Goa ," stated Hamal on Facebook.

Aarti Hamal was last seen around 9:30 PM near North Goa's Ashvem Bridge. The 36-year-old was staying at the Osho Meditation Centre before she went missing.

Her younger sister Arzoo Hamal took to social media and stated that some callers confirmed that she was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim.
translated: 48 घंटा तक गायब, नेपाल के बेटी आर्टी हमल के 'कमजोर कंडीशन' में गोवा में भेटल पनाजी : नेपाल के मेयर गोआपल हमल के बेटी आर्टी हमल भेटल अछि।36 वर्षीय नेपाली महिला सोमदिन सं लापता छलीह.फेसबुक पर एकटा अपडेट साझा करैत नेपाल मेयर शेयर केलनि जे ओ भेटल छथि मुदा "कमजोर हालत" मे छथि।फेसबुक पर हाथ बढ़बैत धनगाधी उप-मेट्रोपोलिटन सिटी के नेपाली के मेयर पुष्टि केलनि जे हुनकर बेटी भेटल अछि मुदा "कमजोर के हालत" में अछि |फेसबुक पर हमल न॑ कहलकै कि हम्में खोज कार्य म॑ मदद करै वाला सब लोगऽ के प्रति अपनऽ आभार व्यक्त करै छियै, साथ ही गोवा म॑ रह॑ वाला सहायक नेपाली भाय आरू बहिनऽ के साथ ।उत्तर गोवा के अश्सेम ब्रिज के पास 9:30 बजे के आसपास आर्टी हमल के अंतिम बेर देखल गेल छल.36 वर्षीय युवक लापता होबय सं पहिने ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर मे ठहरल छलीह.हुनकऽ छोटऽ बहिन अर्जू हमल न॑ सोशल मीडिया प॑ उतरी क॑ कहलकै कि कुछ फोन करै वाला न॑ ई बात के पुष्टि करलकै कि आखिरी बार सिओलिम के पास एगो पुल प॑ हुनका देखलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।

title: Embezzlement crisis in Nepal’s co-ops sparks protests in the street - Co-operative News
description: Embezzlement crisis in Nepal’s co-ops sparks protests in the street  Co-operative News
publisher.title: Co-operative News
full_article:
Members of Nepalese co-ops have reached an agreement with the country’s government on 21 March, after weeks of protest.

Organised by the National Campaign for the Protection of Cooperatives Depositors, the demonstration had brought together more than 280 fraud victims, demanding that co-ops be better regulated.

They had been demanding change for months, with a series of demonstrations outside the Department of Cooperatives in Kathmandu in August last year and February-March this year. The August protests had led to a series of government promises, including measures to return deposits parked in troubled co-ops, but co-op members took to the streets again this year claiming implementation has been too slow.

The victims suspended all the protests on 21 March after a series of new pledges from the government, including the immediate return of the fund of depositors. Other agreed measures include the audit of the accounts of troubled co-ops, strengthening the institutional capacity of co-op bodies and taking legal action against co-op managers, operators, and associated staff who commit offences. A Savings and Loan Security Fund and a Loan Information Center and Loan Recovery Tribunal will be established.

According to the Department of Cooperatives, Nepal is home to more than 32,000 co-ops with 7.3 million members and a combined share capital of Rs94bn (£558m), with Rs478bn (£2.8bn) in deposits and Rs426bn (£2.5bn) in loans. Seventeen of these co-ops, with deposits worth Rs13.14bn (£78m), have recently been described by the department as “troubled”. However, Nepalese press reports claim the figure could be as high as 500.

Recent cases include the arrest of Kedarnath Sharma, former chair of Shiva Shikhar Multipurpose Co-operative, Bhaktapur from Mumbai, India, for his alleged involvement in embezzling Rs14bn from deposits of members. The country’s Central Bureau of Investigation (CIB) claims Sharma has taken his members’ money to set up businesses in India and Myanmar. He was also running Tulasi Cooperatives in Morang.

On 29 February, the Parbat District Court convicted two people of embezzling more than Rs110m from depositors of the Mata Pathibhara Cooperative in Kushma. The court ruled that the co-op’s former chair, Kishor Shrestha, and computer software developer, Pratiman Poudel, were guilty of misappropriating Rs111m worth of savings of depositors of the Kushma-based microfinance. Shrestha was also found guilty of facilitating the embezzlement of depositors’ savings at another Parbat co-op which was chaired by brother Balgopal Shrestha.

Another notorious case involved the Oriental Cooperative, whose manager was found to have embezzled Rs 10.84bn of his members’ money.

Local-level co-operatives are regulated by their municipality while co-ops active in more than one municipality in the same province are regulated by the provincial government.

Provincial co-operatives with annual transactions of over Rs250m are regulated by the Department of Cooperatives while those with transactions over Rs500m are regulated by Nepal Rastra Bank, with support from the Department.

Last October, the Nepal Rastra Bank (NRB) revised its guidelines for licensed banks, and financial institutions are now required to ensure the protection of deposits up to Rs500,000 (from 300,000 previously) for individual account holders in both savings and term deposit accounts through the Deposit and Credit Guarantee Fund. However, co-operatives are not covered by this provision.

Nepal Federation of Savings and Credit Coop Unions has been contacted for comment.
translated: नेपाली को-ऑपर्स के सदस्य 21 मार्च क॑ देश केरऽ सरकार स॑ समझौता करी लेल॑ छै, जेकरा म॑ हफ्ता भर के विरोध प्रदर्शन के बाद छै ।सहकारी संस्थाक कें सुरक्षा कें लेल राष्ट्रीय अभियान कें द्वारा आयोजित, प्रदर्शन सं 280 सं बेसि धोखाधड़ी पीड़ितक कें एक संगे आनल गेल छल, जइ मे सह-अवस्था कें बेहतर ढंग सं नियंत्रित कैल जै कें मांग कैल गेल छै.ई सब महीनो स॑ बदलाव के मांग करी रहलऽ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ पिछला साल अगस्त म॑ काठमांडू आरू ई साल फरवरी-मार्च म॑ काठमांडू म॑ सहकारी विभागऽ के बाहर प्रदर्शन के एक श्रृंखला छेलै ।अगस्त केरऽ विरोध प्रदर्शन स॑ सरकारी वादा केरऽ एक श्रृंखला के रूप म॑ शामिल करलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ परेशान को-ऑप स॑ खड़ा जमा राशि वापस करै के उपाय भी शामिल छेलै, लेकिन को-ऑप सदस्य ई साल फेरू सड़कऽ प॑ उतरी क॑ ई दावा करलकै कि कार्यान्वयन बहुत धीमा होय गेलऽ छै ।पीड़ित लोकनि 21 मार्च कए सरकार स नव प्रणक एकटा श्रृंखला क बाद सबटा विरोध प्रदर्शन कए निलंबित करि देलथि, जाहि मे जमाकर्ता कए कोष क तत्काल वापसी सेहो शामिल अछि।अन्य सहमत उपायक मे परेशान को-ऑपर्स कें खाताक कें लेखा परीक्षा, को-ऑप निकाय कें संस्थागत क्षमता कें मजबूत करनाय आ को-ऑप प्रबंधक, संचालकक, आ संबद्ध कर्मचारीक कें खिलाफ कानूनी कार्रवाई करनाय शामिल छै जे अपराध करय छै.बचत आ ऋण सुरक्षा कोष आ ऋण सूचना केंद्र आ ऋण वसूली न्यायाधिकरण कें स्थापना कैल जेतय.सहकारी विभाग के अनुसार नेपाल में 32,000 स॑ भी अधिक सह-अंश के घर छै जेकरऽ सदस्य 73 लाख सदस्य छै आरू एक संयुक्त शेयर पूंजी 94 अरब रुपया (£558m) छै, जेकरा म॑ 478 अरब रुपया (£2.8bn) जमा आरू 426 अरब रुपया (£2.5bn) छै । ऋण।एहि मे स सत्रह को-ऑपरेटिव, जाहि मे 13.14 अरब रुपया (78 मिलियन पाउंड) क जमा राशि अछि, हाल मे विभाग द्वारा “समस्या” कहल गेल अछि।लेकिन नेपाली प्रेस केरऽ रिपोर्ट म॑ दावा करलऽ गेलऽ छै कि ई आंकड़ा ५०० तलक होय सकै छै ।हाल के मामला म॑ भारत केरऽ मुंबई स॑ शिवा शिखर बहुउद्देशीय सहकारी, भक्तपुर केरऽ पूर्व अध्यक्ष केदारनाथ शर्मा के गिरफ्तारी के आरोप म॑ शामिल छै, जेकरा म॑ हुनकऽ कथित संलग्नता म॑ हुनकऽ कथित संलग्नता म॑ 14 अरब रुपया के जमा राशि म॑ शामिल करलऽ गेलऽ छै । सदस्य।देश केरऽ केंद्रीय जांच ब्यूरो (सीआईबी) के दावा छै कि शर्मा न॑ भारत आरू म्यांमार म॑ व्यवसाय स्थापित करै लेली अपनऽ सदस्यऽ के पैसा ल॑ लेल॑ छै ।मोरंग मे तुलासी सहकारी समिति सेहो चला रहल छलाह।29 फरवरी कए पारबत जिला अदालत कुश्मा क माटा पठाभारा सहकारी क जमाकर्ता स 110 करोड़ स बेसी क गबन क दू गोटे कए दोषी ठहरौलक।कोर्ट न॑ फैसला करलकै कि को-ऑप केरऽ पूर्व अध्यक्ष किशोर श्रेष्ठ आरू कंप्यूटर सॉफ्टवेयर डेवलपर, प्रतिमन पौडेल कुशमा स्थित माइक्रोफाइनेंस केरऽ जमाकर्ता केरऽ बचत केरऽ 111 मिलियन रुपया केरऽ बचत के दुरुपयोग करै के दोषी छै ।श्रेथ क॑ एगो आरू परबत को-ऑप प॑ जमाकर्ता सिनी के बचत के गबन के सुविधा के सुविधा भी दोषी ठहरालऽ गेलऽ छेलै जेकरऽ अध्यक्षता बलगोपाल श्रेस्थन न॑ करलकै ।एकटा आओर कुख्यात मामला मे ओरिएंटल कोऑपरेटिव शामिल छल, जिनकर प्रबंधक अपन सदस्यक 10.84 अरब रुपया गबन मे पाओल गेल छल.स्थानीय स्तर के सहकारी समितियऽ क॑ ओकरऽ नगरपालिका द्वारा नियंत्रित करलऽ जाय छै जबकि एक ही प्रांत म॑ एक स॑ अधिक नगरपालिका म॑ सक्रिय को-ऑपकार क॑ प्रांतीय सरकार द्वारा नियंत्रित करलऽ जाय छै ।250 रुपया सं बेसि कें वार्षिक लेनदेन वाला प्रांतीय सहकारी संस्थाक कें सहकारी विभागक कें द्वारा नियंत्रित कैल जायत छै जखन कि 500 ​​करोड़ रुपया सं बेसि लेनदेन वाला कें विनियमित कैल गेल छै, नेपाल रास्त्रा बैंक कें द्वारा, विभाग कें समर्थन कें साथ.पिछला अक्टूबर मे नेपाल रास्ट्रा बैंक (एनआरबी) लाइसेंसधारी बैंकक कें लेल अपन दिशा निर्देशक कें संशोधित करलकय, आ वित्तीय संस्थाक कें आब बचत आ अवधि जमा खाता दूनू मे व्यक्तिगत खाता धारक कें लेल 500,000 रुपया (300,000 सं पहिने) कें जमा कें सुरक्षा सुनिश्चित करनाय आवश्यक छै. जमा आ क्रेडिट गारंटी फंड के माध्यम सं.मुदा सहकारी संस्था एहि प्रावधान मे शामिल नहि अछि।नेपाल फेडरेशन ऑफ सेविंग्स एंड क्रेडिट कोप यूनियन सं संपर्क कएल गेल अछि.

title: Nepal Mayor's daughter missing from Goa found two days after massive search operation - India TV News
description: Nepal Mayor's daughter missing from Goa found two days after massive search operation  India TV News
publisher.title: India TV News
full_article:
Follow us on Image Source : @GOPALHAMAL7/X Aarti Hamal

Goa: The daughter of a mayor in Nepal who went missing from Goa for the last two days was found at a hotel on Wednesday. Gopal Hamal, father of 36-year-old Aarti Hamal, had appealed on social media platforms to inform him if anyone had information about her whereabouts. The Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city mayor said that they received a message from her friend that she had lost contact.

"When the family tried to reach her, they got no response and alerted the police," he said in an X post.

The desperate father said Aarti had been staying at an Osho meditation centre in Goa for the past few months. He added that the last location was unknown but added someone had seen her near Ashwem Beach.

"My elder daughter Aarti is an Osho meditator and has been living in Goa for the past few months. However, I received a message from her friend stating that she lost contact with Aarti near Zorba Beach, Ashwem yesterday. I request those living in Goa to assist in the search for my daughter, Aarti. Also, my younger daughter Arzoo and son-in-law are flying to Goa tonight to look for our elder daughter Aarti," Hamal wrote on X.

Subsequently, Goa Police registered a case and started a search operation to track her daughter.

Aarti's sister also pleaded for help on social media

Later, Arzoo Hamal, her sister, also took to social media and said some callers had claimed to have seen Aarti at a bridge near Siolim. "We just reached Hyderabad, we have a 5-hour long transit before our flight to Goa. We have received more than 500 calls since we left from Nepal to Lucknow. We are still getting calls even after 12:00 am. According to some callers she was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim. Few of them believe that she was taken to a hospital from there in an ambulance as she was found unconscious while the others have been saying that she was taken to the police station," wrote Arzoo.

"Our well-wishers who have reached out and are trying to help have been looking in hospitals and police stations in and around that area. But nothing has really been clear so far," she added. Later, the Goa Police said Aarti was found at a hotel in North Goa's Mandrem.

मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म पर अपील केने छलाह जे हुनका सूचित क देल गेल छल जे कियो हुनकर ठिकाना के बारे में जानकारी अछि.धंगाधी उप-महानगरीय शहर के मेयर कहलनि जे हुनका सभ के हुनकर दोस्त के तरफ सं एकटा संदेश भेटलनि जे हुनकर संपर्क खत्म भ गेल अछि.एक्स पोस्ट मे ओ कहला जे जखन परिवार हुनका लग पहुंचबाक कोशिश केलक त ओकरा कोनो प्रतिक्रिया नहि भेटल आ पुलिस कए अलर्ट केलक।हताश पिताजी कहलनि जे आर्टी पिछला किछु मास सं गोवा के एकटा ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर मे रहैत छलाह.हुनी आरू कहलकै कि आखिरी स्थान के बारे मँ पता नै छेलै लेकिन हुनी जोड़लकै कि अश्वेम बीच के पास कोय हुनका देखलकै ।"हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी आर्टी ओशो मेडिटेटर छै आरू पिछला कुछ महीना स॑ गोवा म॑ रह॑ लगलऽ छै । लेकिन हमरा हुनकऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो संदेश मिललै कि हुनी काल्ह अश्वेम केरऽ ज़ोरबा बीच के पास आर्टी के साथ संपर्क गंवाय देलकै । हम्में गोवा म॑ रह॑ वाला लोगऽ स॑ आग्रह करै छियै । हमरऽ बेटी, आर्टी के खोज म॑ सहायता करै लेली, साथ ही, हमरऽ छोटऽ बेटी आर्जू आरू जमाय आय रात गोवा लेली उड़ान भर॑ छै आरू हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी आर्टी क॑ खोजै लेली," हमल न॑ एक्स पर लिखलकै, बाद म॑ गोवा पुलिस न॑ एक केस दर्ज करलकै आरू अपन बेटी के ट्रैक करय लेल एकटा सर्च ऑपरेशन शुरू केलनि।आर्टी केरऽ बहिन न॑ भी बाद म॑ सोशल मीडिया प॑ मदद लेली गुहार लगैलकै, ओकरऽ बहिन आर्जू हमल न॑ भी सोशल मीडिया प॑ उतरी क॑ कहलकै कि कुछ फोन करै वाला न॑ दावा करल॑ छै कि वू सिओलीम के पास एगो पुल प॑ आर्टी क॑ देखलकै ।"हम बस हैदराबाद पहुँचल छी, हमरा सब लग गोवा जेबाक हमर उड़ान सँ पहिने 5 घंटाक लंबा ट्रांजिट अछि। हमरा सभ केँ नेपाल सँ लखनऊ धरि गेलाक बाद सँ 500 सँ बेसी कॉल भेटल अछि। 12:00 बजेक बाद सेहो हमरा सभ केँ फोन आबि रहल अछि। किछु गोटेक अनुसार। फोन करय वाला ओकरा अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल.ओहि मे सं किछुए लोक के माननाय छनि जे हुनका एम्बुलेंस मे एकटा अस्पताल ल' गेल गेल छलन्हि किएक त' हुनका बेहोश भेटल छलन्हि जखन कि आन लोक सभ कहैत रहलाह अछि जे हुनका थाना ल' गेल गेल छल.' के .ओ आगू कहलनि जे, हमर नीक अलिश करय वाला लोक जे हाथ बढ़ा क मदद करय के कोशिश क रहल छथि, ओहि इलाका मे आ आसपास अस्पताल आ थाना मे देखैत रहलाह अछि, मुदा एखन धरि वास्तव मे किछु स्पष्ट नहि भेल अछि।बाद मे गोवा पुलिस कहलक जे नॉर्थ गोवा के मंडरेम के एकटा होटल मे आर्टी भेटल छल.इहो पढ़ू: नेपाली नागरिक रूस आ यूक्रेन दुनू मे लड़ि रहल छथि, 700 सँ बेसी परिवार मॉस्को सँ मदद लेल पूछैत अछि: रिपोर्ट करू

title: US is not investing to spread atheism in Nepal: US Ambassador Thompson - Myrepublica
description: US is not investing to spread atheism in Nepal: US Ambassador Thompson  Myrepublica
publisher.title: Myrepublica
full_article:
KATHMANDU, March 27: Dean R Thompson, the US Ambassador to Nepal, had a courtesy meeting with Rastriya Prajatantra Party (RPP) Chairman Rajendra Lingden at the RPP Central Office in Dhumbarahi this morning.

During the meeting, various issues of bilateral interests were cordially discussed. RPP Chairman Lingden inquired about discussions in the US Congress regarding US investment to spread atheism in Nepal, according to RPP Spokesperson Mohan Kumar Shrestha.

The ambassador clarified to Chairman Lingden that the US has not made any investment to spread atheism in Nepal and has no policy to do so. He also emphasized that the US policy aims to support religious harmony and unity in Nepal, including the return of stolen idols from Nepal to be restored in their respective temples.

Similarly, the meeting addressed the RPP's preparations for Kathmandu-centered demonstrations following the submission of a 40-point demand to the government.
translated: काठमांडू, 27 मार्च : नेपाल केरऽ अमेरिकी राजदूत डीन आर थॉम्पसन न॑ आय सुबह ढुम्बारही केरऽ आरपीपी केंद्रीय कार्यालय म॑ रसिया प्रजातन्त्र पार्टी (आरपीपी) के अध्यक्ष राजेन्द्र लिंगडेन के साथ सौजन्य बैठक करलकै ।बैठक के दौरान द्विपक्षीय हित के विभिन्न मुद्दा के सादर चर्चा करलऽ गेलै ।आरपीपी के प्रवक्ता मोहन कुमार श्रेस्थ के अनुसार आरपीपी के अध्यक्ष लिंगडेन न॑ अमेरिकी कांग्रेस म॑ नेपाल म॑ नास्तिकता फैलाबै लेली अमेरिकी निवेश के संबंध म॑ चर्चा के बारे म॑ पूछलकै ।राजदूत न॑ अध्यक्ष लिंगडेन क॑ स्पष्ट करलकै कि अमेरिका न॑ नेपाल म॑ नास्तिकता क॑ फैलाबै लेली कोनो निवेश नै करलकै आरू ओकरा पास ऐसनऽ करै के कोय नीति नै छै ।हुनी ई बात प॑ भी जोर देलकै कि अमेरिकी नीति के उद्देश्य नेपाल म॑ धार्मिक सौहार्द आरू एकता के समर्थन करना छै, जेकरा म॑ नेपाल स॑ चोरी के मूर्ति के वापसी भी शामिल छै जेकरा अपनऽ-अपनऽ मंदिरऽ म॑ बहाल करलऽ जैतै ।तहिना एहि बैसार मे सरकार कए 40 अंक क मांग प्रस्तुत करबाक बाद काठमांडू केंद्रित प्रदर्शन क लेल आरपीपी क तैयारी कए संबोधित कैल गेल।

title: Nepal mayor`s daughter goes missing during Goa retreat, found after 2 days - WION
description: Nepal mayor`s daughter goes missing during Goa retreat, found after 2 days  WION
publisher.title: WION
full_article:
The daughter of a mayor in Nepal who had disappeared on Monday (Mar 25) in India's western state of Goa has been located, according to police.

Aarti Hamal, 36, was found at a hotel in Mandrem, North Goa.

Earlier, she was reported missing by her father, Gopal Hamal, the mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city.

Aarti had been staying at an Osho meditation centre in Goa for the past few months.

Gopal Hamal had stated in a post on X (formerly Twitter) that she was last seen near Ashwem Beach.

Her family received a message from Aarti's friend stating that they had lost contact with her.

Despite attempts to reach her, there was no response, prompting the family to alert the police, who then launched a search operation.

According to Gopal Hamal, they were informed by a friend of Aarti that contact with her had been lost.

Despite the family's attempts to communicate with her, they received no response, prompting them to notify the police.

"My elder daughter Aarti is an Osho meditator and has been living in Goa for the past few months. However, I received a message from her friend stating that she lost contact with Aarti near Zorba Beach, Ashwem yesterday. I request those living in Goa to assist in the search for my daughter, Aarti," Hamal had said.

"Also, my younger daughter Arzoo and son-in-law are flying to Goa tonight to look for our elder daughter Aarti," he added.

Arzoo Hamal, her sister, shared an update on Facebook stating that certain callers had reported seeing Aarti near a bridge close to Siolim. × "Some of the people have been very helpful and we are eternally grateful to them. According to some callers she was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim. Few of them believe that she was taken to a hospital from there in an ambulance as she was found unconscious while the others have been saying that she was taken to the police station," Arzoo said in a Facebook post.
translated: भारत के पश्चिमी राज्य गोवा में सोमदिन (25 मार्च) के गायब भ गेल नेपाल के एकटा मेयर के बेटी के बारे में पता चलल अछि।36 वर्षीय आर्टी हमल नॉर्थ गोवा के मंड्रेम के एकटा होटल मे भेटल छल।एहि सं पहिने हुनका अपन पिता गोपाल हमल, धनगाधी उप-महानगर शहर के मेयर गोपाल हमल के लापता करय के खबरि छलन्हि.आर्टी पिछला किछु मास सं गोवा के एकटा ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर मे रहैत छल.गोपाल हमल न॑ एक्स (पहिने ट्विटर) प॑ एगो पोस्ट म॑ बतैलकै कि आखिरी बार आश्वेम बीच के पास हुनका देखलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।हुनकऽ परिवार क॑ आर्टी केरऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो संदेश मिललै जेकरा म॑ कहलऽ गेलऽ छेलै कि हुनका स॑ हुनकऽ संपर्क खतम होय गेलऽ छै ।हुनका पास पहुँचै के कोशिश के बावजूद कोनो प्रतिक्रिया नै भेलै, जेकरा स॑ परिवार पुलिस क॑ सचेत करै लेली प्रेरित करलकै, जेकरा बाद म॑ सर्च ऑपरेशन शुरू करलऽ गेलै ।गोपाल हमल के अनुसार हुनका सब के आर्टी के एकटा दोस्त द्वारा सूचित कयल गेल छल जे हुनका सं संपर्क हेरा गेल छल |परिवार केरऽ हुनका स॑ संवाद करै के कोशिश के बावजूद हुनका सब क॑ कोनो प्रतिक्रिया नै मिललै, जेकरा स॑ हुनका पुलिस क॑ सूचित करै लेली प्रेरित करलऽ गेलै ।"हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी आर्टी ओशो मेडिटेटर छै आरू पिछला कुछ महीना स॑ गोवा म॑ रह॑ लगलऽ छै । लेकिन हमरा हुनकऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो संदेश मिललै कि हुनी काल्ह अश्वेम केरऽ ज़ोरबा बीच के पास आर्टी के साथ संपर्क गंवाय देलकै । हम्में गोवा म॑ रह॑ वाला लोगऽ स॑ आग्रह करै छियै । हमरऽ बेटी, आर्टी के खोज म॑ सहायता करै लेली," हमल न॑ कहने छेलै ।ओ आगू कहलनि जे, संगहि हमर छोट बेटी अर्जू आ जमाय आइ राति गोवा के लेल उड़ि रहल छथि जे हमर पैघ बेटी आर्टी के तलाश मे छथि।हुनकऽ बहिन आर्जू हमल न॑ फेसबुक प॑ एगो अपडेट साझा करलकै जेकरा म॑ कहलऽ गेलऽ छेलै कि कुछ कॉलर न॑ सिओलीम के नजदीक के एगो पुल के पास आर्टी क॑ देखै के खबर देल॑ छेलै ।× "किछु लोक बहुत मददगार रहल अछि आ हम सब ओकरा सब के अनन्त आभारी छी। किछु फोन करय वाला के अनुसार हुनका अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल। किछुए लोक के मानब छनि जे हुनका एम्बुलेंस में ओतय सं अस्पताल ल गेल गेल छल जेना कि ओ अचेतन पाबैलऽ गेलै जबकि बाकी लोगऽ न॑ कहै छै कि ओकरा थाना ल॑ जायलऽ गेलै ।'

title: Nepal Govt, Global Banks Harmonize Disbursement Practices - Mirage News
description: Nepal Govt, Global Banks Harmonize Disbursement Practices  Mirage News
publisher.title: Mirage News
full_article:
KATHMANDU, March 27, 2024 - The Government of Nepal and six Multilateral Developments Banks (MDBs) and International Financial Institutions (IFIs)-Agence Française de Développement, Asian Development Bank, Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, International Fund for Agricultural Development, OPEC Fund for International Development, and the World Bank-agreed to work together to harmonize disbursement procedures and practices to help enhance operational efficiency and achieve Nepal's development goals.

The agreement was reached at a two-day 'MDBs Disbursement Harmonization Workshop' organized in Kathmandu on March 25-26, 2024, by the MDBs and IFIs, in close partnership with the Ministry of Finance.

"Fostering a unified disbursement system among all MDBs will help facilitate allocation of funds, enhance operational efficiency, and ensure timely disbursement of funds to the government to achieve development results," said Dr. Krishna Hari Pushkar, Secretary, Ministry of Finance.

The Government of Nepal and MDB-IFIs agreed to focus on the following in their future collaboration:

· Harmonize flow of funds, reporting, legal and disbursement arrangements for the three-tier structure of government.

· Standardize reporting templates across MDB-IFIs' operations in Nepal to reduce the administrative burden on the government.

· Strengthen and align country system with MDBs-IFIs to the extent possible.

"Unprecedented challenges demand urgent action and the need for harmonization among the MDB-IFIs. The World Bank, in its continued efforts to improve operational efficiency and support better development results for our mutual clients, is committed to work with co-financing partners in the area of disbursement harmonization," said Pamela O'Connell, World Bank Vice President and Controller.

Government representatives and MDB-IFIs agreed to carry froward the momentum by way of a Memorandum of Understanding between the Government and MDB-IFIs which will be prepared and implemented in a phased manner. The Kathmandu Declaration would be a model to be emulated in other countries.

"To achieve sustainable economic growth and poverty reduction it is imperative that budget allocation is fully utilized. The government is committed to strengthening reforms to build transparency and accountability of public financial management systems and strengthen service delivery," said Hari Prasad Mainali, Financial Comptroller General.

The workshop was attended by high-level representatives from the government and MDB-IFIs. Participants discussed disbursement and implementation-related opportunities and challenges, and the way forward to supporting MDB-IFIs operations in Nepal. In view of the federalism transition, legal and disbursement options available for project implementation at provincial and local levels were also discussed, and international experiences were shared.
translated: काठमांडू, 27 मार्च, 2024 - नेपाल सरकार एवं छह बहुपक्षीय विकास बैंक (एमडीबी) एवं अंतर्राष्ट्रीय वित्तीय संस्थान (आईएफआईएस)-एजेन्स फ्रांसेस डी डेवेलेपेमेंट, एशियाई विकास बैंक, एशियाई बुनियादी ढांचा निवेश बैंक, कृषि विकास के लिए अंतर्राष्ट्रीय कोष, ओपेक कोष अंतर्राष्ट्रीय विकास, आरू विश्व बैंक-सहमत मिल क॑ वितरण प्रक्रिया आरू प्रथा क॑ सामंजस्य बनैलऽ जाय छै ताकि परिचालन दक्षता बढ़ाबै आरू नेपाल केरऽ विकास लक्ष्य क॑ प्राप्त करै म॑ मदद मिल॑ सक॑ ।ई समझौता 25-26 मार्च, 2024 क॑ काठमांडू म॑ आयोजित दू दिन के ‘एमडीबीएस डिस्बर्समेंट हार्मोनाइजेशन वर्कशॉप’ म॑ एमडीबीएस आरू आईएफआई द्वारा आयोजित करलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, जे वित्त मंत्रालय के साथ घनिष्ठ साझेदारी म॑ छेलै ।वित्त मंत्रालय केरऽ सचिव डॉ. कृष्णा हरि पुष्कर न॑ कहलकै कि सब एमडीबी के बीच एकीकृत वितरण प्रणाली क॑ बढ़ाबै स॑ धनराशि आवंटन म॑ सुविधा मिलतै, परिचालन दक्षता बढ़ाबै म॑ मदद मिलतै, आरू विकास केरऽ परिणाम प्राप्त करै लेली सरकार क॑ धनराशि के समय-समय पर वितरण सुनिश्चित करलऽ जैतै ।नेपाल आरू एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस सरकार न॑ अपनऽ भविष्य केरऽ सहयोग म॑ निम्नलिखित प॑ ध्यान केंद्रित करै लेली सहमत होय गेलै : · सरकार केरऽ तीन स्तरीय संरचना लेली धन केरऽ प्रवाह, रिपोर्टिंग, कानूनी आरू वितरण व्यवस्था के सामंजस्य बनाबै के काम करलकै ।· सरकार पर प्रशासनिक बोझ कम करय लेल नेपाल मे एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस के संचालन के पार रिपोर्टिंग टेम्पलेट के मानकीकरण करू.· एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस कें साथ देश प्रणाली कें ओतबे संभव सीमा कें मजबूत आ संरेखित करूं."अभूतपूर्व चुनौती तत्काल कार्रवाई आरू एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस के बीच सामंजस्य के जरूरत के मांग करै छै. विश्व बैंक, परिचालन दक्षता म॑ सुधार आरू हमरऽ आपसी ग्राहकऽ लेली बेहतर विकास परिणामऽ के समर्थन करै के अपनऽ निरंतर प्रयासऽ म॑, 100 म॑ सह-वित्तपोषण भागीदारऽ के साथ काम करै लेली प्रतिबद्ध छै. वितरण सामंजस्य के क्षेत्र," विश्व बैंक के उपाध्यक्ष एवं नियंत्रक पामेला ओ'कोनेल न॑ कहलकै ।सरकारी प्रतिनिधि आरू एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस सरकार आरू एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस के बीच समझ के ज्ञापन के माध्यम स॑ गति क॑ ल॑ क॑ फ्यूवर्ड क॑ ले जाय प॑ सहमत होय गेलै जेकरा क॑ चरणबद्ध तरीका स॑ तैयार करी क॑ लागू करलऽ जैतै ।काठमांडू घोषणा एकटा मॉडल होयत जकर अनुकरण अन्य देश मे होयत।वित्तीय नियंत्रक सामान्य जनरल हरि प्रसाद मैनेली नँ कहलकै, "स्थायी आर्थिक विकास आरू गरीबी मँ कमी क प्राप्त करै लेली ई अनिवार्य छै कि बजट आवंटन के पूरा उपयोग करलौ जाय । सरकार सार्वजनिक वित्तीय प्रबंधन प्रणाली के पारदर्शिता आरू जवाबदेही के निर्माण आरू सेवा प्रदायगी क मजबूत करै लेली सुधार क मजबूत करै लेली प्रतिबद्ध छै । के .एहि कार्यशाला मे सरकार आ एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस क उच्च स्तरीय प्रतिनिधि शामिल छलाह ।प्रतिभागी न॑ वितरण आरू कार्यान्वयन स॑ संबंधित अवसर आरू चुनौतियऽ प॑ चर्चा करलकै, आरू नेपाल म॑ एमडीबी-आईएफआईएस परिचालन क॑ समर्थन दै लेली आगू के रास्ता प॑ चर्चा करलकै ।संघीयता संक्रमण क॑ देखत॑ हुअ॑ प्रांतीय आरू स्थानीय स्तर प॑ परियोजना कार्यान्वयन लेली उपलब्ध कानूनी आरू वितरण विकल्पऽ प॑ भी चर्चा करलऽ गेलै, आरू अंतर्राष्ट्रीय अनुभव साझा करलऽ गेलै ।

title: How Goa Police Found Nepal Mayor's Daughter Who Went Missing From Retreat - NDTV
description: How Goa Police Found Nepal Mayor's Daughter Who Went Missing From Retreat  NDTV
publisher.title: NDTV
full_article:
Aarti Hamal was reported missing on March 25. (File)

Aarti Hamal, the 36-year-old daughter of a mayor in Nepal, stepped out with her friends in Goa and left her phone in the meditation resort she was staying at. Unable to get in touch with her, her family filed a missing complaint with Goa police and immediately boarded a flight to Goa.

What followed was a two-day massive search operation, which ended when the police found Aarti at a hotel at Chopdem village in North Goa, around 20 km away from where she went missing on March 25.

The saga began when Aarti vanished without a trace from the Osho meditation center in Goa where she had been staying for months. Her sudden disappearance prompted alarm bells.

Her father Gopal Hamal, the mayor of Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city in Nepal, posted an appeal on X (formerly Twitter) urging everyone in Goa to contact him if they spot his daughter.

The family also filed a complaint with the police. Investigators pieced together the timeline, revealing that Aarti Hamal was last spotted in Siolim, North Goa, on March 25, appearing composed and in control.

"A massive search operation was launched across the state to trace her. Eyewitnesses claim she was in her senses when they last saw her" police said.

As hours turned into days, Goa police intensified their efforts and began checking every hotel in the Pernem and Mandrem area. Police also looked for her at another Osho centre located at Canacona.

"She has been frequently visiting Goa. She had left her phone back at the Osho centre, due to which she could not be traced with the help of technical surveillance," he said.

A breakthrough emerged on Wednesday when cops found Aarti Hamal in a hotel at Chopdem village.

"On Wednesday, Hamal was found in a hotel at Chopdem village along with two other women, who are her friends," he said.

The police are in the process of recording her statement, the official said, adding that her family members have arrived in the state.
translated: 25 मार्च कए आर्टी हमल कए लापता हेबाक सूचना भेटल छल।(फाइल) नेपाल क एकटा मेयर क 36 वर्षीय बेटी आर्टी हमल अपन दोस्त क संग गोवा मे अपन फोन स बाहर निकललाह जाहि मे ओ ठहरल छलाह।हुनका सं संपर्क नै भ सकला पर हुनकर परिवार गोवा पुलिस के संग एकटा गायब शिकायत दर्ज करौलक आ तुरंत गोवा के लेल फ्लाइट पर चढ़ि गेल।एकर बाद जे भेल से छल दू दिनक विशाल खोज अभियान, जे तखन समाप्त भेल जखन पुलिस के नॉर्थ गोवा के चोपडेम विलेज के एकटा होटल में आर्टी के भेटल छल, लगभग 20 किमी दूर जतय ओ 25 मार्च के लापता गेल छल.सागा के शुरुआत तखन भेल जखन आर्टी बिना कोनो ट्रेस के गायब भ गेल. गोवा केरऽ ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर स॑ जहाँ वू महीना भर स॑ ठहरलऽ छेली ।ओकर अचानक गायब भेला पर अलार्म घंटी आबि गेलै।नेपाल केरऽ धनगाधी उप-मौलतन शहर केरऽ मेयर हुनकऽ पिता गोपाल हमल न॑ एक्स (पहिने ट्विटर) प॑ अपील पोस्ट करलकै जेकरा म॑ गोवा म॑ सब क॑ आग्रह करलऽ गेलऽ छेलै कि अगर वू अपनऽ बेटी क॑ देखै छै त॑ ओकरा स॑ संपर्क करी क॑ ।परिवार पुलिस के सेहो शिकायत दर्ज करौलक।जांचकर्ता न॑ टाइमलाइन के टुकड़ा-टुकड़ा करी क॑ ई खुलासा करलकै कि 25 मार्च क॑ उत्तरी गोवा केरऽ सियोलिम म॑ अंतिम बेर हमल क॑ अंतिम बार देखलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ संयम आरू नियंत्रण म॑ दिखाय देलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।पुलिस के कहनाय अछि जे राज्य भर मे हुनकर पता लगाबय लेल एकटा पैघ खोज अभियान शुरू कएल गेल छल.प्रत्यक्षता के दावा अछि जे ओ हुनकर हालत मे छल जखन ओ अंतिम बेर हुनका देखलखिन्ह.जेना-जेना घंटों दिन में बदलैत गेल, गोवा पुलिस अपन प्रयास तेज केलक आ परनेम आ मंडरेम इलाका के हर होटल के जांच करय लागल.पुलिस ओकरा एकटा आओर ओशो केंद्र पर सेहो देखैत छल जे कैनाकोना मे स्थित अछि.ओ कहलनि जे, ओ बेर-बेर गोवा सं भेंट करैत आबि रहल छथि, ओ ओशो सेंटर पर अपन फोन वापस छोड़ि देने छलीह, जाहि सं हुनका तकनीकी निगरानी के मदद सं पता नहि चलल छल.बुधदिन एकटा सफलता सामने आयल जखन पुलिस कए चोपडेम गामक एकटा होटल मे आर्टी हमल भेटल।ओ कहलनि जे, बुधदिन हमल चोपडेम विलेज के एकटा होटल मे दू टा आओर महिला के संग भेटल छल, जे हुनकर दोस्त अछि।पुलिस अपन बयान रिकॉर्ड करबाक प्रक्रिया मे अछि, अधिकारी कहलनि जे, हुनकर परिवारक सदस्य राज्य मे पहुंचल छथि।

title: Daughter of Mayor from Nepal goes 'missing' in Goa, found in hotel two days later - The Hindu
description: Daughter of Mayor from Nepal goes 'missing' in Goa, found in hotel two days later  The Hindu
publisher.title: The Hindu
full_article:
March 27, 2024 03:25 pm | Updated 04:25 pm IST - Panaji

Two days after the 36-year-old daughter of a Mayor in Nepal was reported missing from Goa, she was traced to a hotel in the coastal State on March 26, police said.

The woman, Aarti Hamal, was found at the hotel located at Chopdem village in North Goa, around 20 km away from where she went missing on March 25, they said.

“Hamal was reported missing from the Osho meditation centre near Mandrem in North Goa, where she arrived from Nepal a month back. The management of the centre had lodged a missing person’s complaint at Mandrem police station,” a senior police official said.

Before going missing, the woman was last seen at Siolim (North Goa) on March 25, he said.

“A massive search operation was launched across the State to trace her,” the official said, adding that the eyewitnesses claimed that she was very much in her senses when they last saw her.

Police had also started looking for her at another Osho centre in the State located at Canacona, he added.

“She has been frequently visiting Goa. She had left her phone back at the Osho centre, due to which she could not be traced with the help of technical surveillance,” he said.

The State police had started searching all the hotels in and around Pernem and Mandrem areas of North Goa, the official said.

“On Wednesday, Hamal was found in a hotel at Chopdem village along with two other women, who are her friends,” he said.

The police are in the process of recording her statement, the official said, adding that her family members have arrived in the State.

Her father had earlier released a post on social media seeking help from the people to trace her.

title: Running for a Cause: How Trail Running Connects With Nepal Through the Himalayan Trust’s Summit Challenge - iRunFar
description: Running for a Cause: How Trail Running Connects With Nepal Through the Himalayan Trust’s Summit Challenge  iRunFar
publisher.title: iRunFar
full_article:
[Editor’s Note: Casey Hemmingway of the Himalayan Trust, a nonprofit based in New Zealand, wrote this Community Voices article.]

In the footprints of giants, we find our path. For many in the New Zealand outdoor community, the country’s reowned mountaineer and philanthropist Sir Edmund Hillary’s monumental legacy is not just in the peaks he scaled but in the lives he uplifted.

As summer fades into autumn in the Southern Hemisphere, March is a prime time for runners to get out in the hills, so it’s no surprise that it’s also the time of the Himalayan Trust’s Summit Challenge. This month-long challenge encourages runners to gather as much elevation as possible while fundraising for the New Zealand-based Himalayan Trust, which was started by Hillary in 1961.

The event has become a fixture in the country’s trail running community, with runners in different locations, from the mountainous Southern Alps to the Canterbury plains and the cityscapes of Auckland, adding their own creative twist to the challenge.

And while the Summit Challenge offers motivation to push personal limits, it’s also a chance to make a difference in a country that has had close ties with New Zealand for a long time.

The Essence of Trail Running and Ultrarunning

The essence of trail running and ultrarunning goes beyond the physical challenge; it’s a mental and spiritual journey.

This resonates deeply with the work of the Himalayan Trust in Nepal, which is involved in education, healthcare, and environmental programs there. Runners and the communities supported by the trust showcase resilience, determination, and a profound sense of community. It’s about pushing limits, overcoming obstacles, and achieving what we once thought impossible — like when Hillary and Tenzing Norgay climbed Everest in 1953.

After the successful Everest expedition, Hillary asked a Sherpa in Nepal how he could help. The reply, “Our children have eyes but they are blind and cannot see. We would like you to open their eyes by building a school in our village.” Hillary started by building a school in Khumjung, a village in northeast Nepal, and continued his work with additional schools, hospitals, and health clinics around the Solukhumbu region, in the foothills of Mount Everest.

Today, the trust continues the legacy, led by Hillary’s son, Peter Hillary, as Chairman, and his grandson, Alexander Hillary, as General Manager. The Summit Challenge educates New Zealanders about the link between the countries and continues the longstanding support.

The Summit Challenge: Impact Through Endurance

The Summit Challenge, running annually from March 1 to March 31, invites the global trail running community to rally for a common cause: supporting the people of Nepal. Participants set their sights on elevation goals that not only challenge their physical and mental endurance but also reflect their commitment to making a difference, by setting a fundraising goal as well.

The challenge offers a range of elevation goals to suit various levels of ambition and ability, including climbing the elevation to Lukla Airport in the Mount Everest region at 2,845 metres (9,334 feet), Everest Base Camp at 5,364 metres (17,589 feet), or Mount Everest at 8,850 metres (29,032 feet).

And because New Zealand trail runners are known for loving their mountains and going uphill, there’s also a Triple Crown challenge, climbing the combined elevations of the Nepalese mountains Everest, Lhotse, and Nuptse, totaling 25,226 metres (82,763 feet).

When New Zealand Ran for Nepal: The Mount Iron Mega Challenge

In the heart of the town of Wanaka, New Zealand, on the country’s South Island, an event was set that epitomized the spirit of endurance and community: the 2024 Mount Iron Mega Challenge. Orchestrated by the Kinisi Running store’s Ian Evans and his wife Jane, this 24-hour event on March 9 and 10 was a collective mission to make a difference, a statement of solidarity with Nepal from the trails of New Zealand.

The course was simple: a five-kilometer (3.1 miles) roundtrip from the Kinisi Running doorstep to the summit of Mount Iron and back. Each lap of this local backyard hill has 240 metres (787 feet) of elevation gain. It’s a hill trail runners in Wanaka know well: a go-to after- or pre-work jaunt, a walk to catch up with friends, a place for hill intervals, or the quick run when there’s no time for anything else. It’s the community’s hill.

Over 70 people stepped up, turning the mountain into a mosaic of determination and unity. Together, they summited more than 300 times in 24 hours, with Blair Cooper ticking off 25 summits and iRunFar’s own Eszter Horanyi getting to the top 21 times, donning fairy wings, lights, and a tutu for the nighttime laps.

At the end of the day, it’s all about community and the final six hours saw an endless stream of people of all ages traveling the route from Kinisi Running to the summit.

The 2024 Mount Iron Mega Challenge was more than an event, it was a testament to the power of community. In Wanaka, for those 24 hours, runners weren’t just chasing the next summit, they were bridging continents, connecting New Zealand’s peaks with the aspirations of Nepal’s next generation.

Gavin Lang’s Mountain Miles: Beyond Running

Gavin Lang, a seasoned mountaineer, insists he’s no runner. Yet, watching him ascend and descend mountains with remarkable swiftness, you might beg to differ. His participation in the Summit Challenge blurs the lines between trail running and mountaineering, as often happens in New Zealand’s Southern Alps on its countless 2,000- and 3,000-metre peaks.

In 2022, Gavin took on the challenge with a unique partner: his daughter Violet. Their approach? Leading weekly group hikes up a local hill, a practice that quickly turned into a community event, rallying around the cause. This father-daughter duo didn’t just climb, they inspired a collective effort in their backyard.

The real impact of their endeavour became clear later that year when they visited the Solukhumbu region of Nepal. There, they met children benefiting from the challenge’s funds — kids the same age as Gavin’s daughter. This visit wasn’t just about seeing the change; it was about understanding the deeper connection forged through shared challenges and triumphs, regardless of the distance.

Gavin’s story, from the trails of New Zealand to the hills of Nepal, underscores a simple truth: whether you run, hike, or climb, it’s the steps you take for others that truly ascend beyond the physical peaks.

A Run Toward a Better Tomorrow

This year’s challenge has been a remarkable success, with over 500 participants throughout New Zealand and Australia signing up and collectively climbing more than 1.3 million vertical metres (nearly 4 million feet). Their combined efforts have already raised over $77,000 NZD, contributing significantly to the Himalayan Trust’s mission in Nepal.

The platform encourages engagement via personal and team fundraising profiles, Strava integration for activity tracking, and leaderboards to encourage competition. It’s a powerful demonstration of how individual efforts can amalgamate into a significant impact, transforming personal achievements into collective progress for the remote communities of the Himalayas supported by the Himalayan Trust. Participating in the Summit Challenge is not just about reaching new heights physically; it’s about lifting others with every step and every metre ascended.

As runners, we often seek challenges that test our limits and expand our horizons. Participating in the Summit Challenge offers an opportunity to do just that while contributing to a cause far beyond the finish line.

Though March is nearly over, it’s never too late to support the Himalayan Trust through a donation. Your contribution goes directly toward our education, healthcare, and environmental programs in Nepal, making a real difference.

न॑ साइन अप करी क॑ 13 लाख स॑ भी अधिक ऊर्ध्वाधर मीटर (लगभग 40 लाख फीट) प॑ चढ़ी क॑ चढ़ी गेलऽ छै ।हुनकऽ संयुक्त प्रयास स॑ पहल॑ ही ७७,००० डॉलर स॑ भी अधिक के एनजेडडी जुटलऽ छै, जे नेपाल म॑ हिमालयन ट्रस्ट केरऽ मिशन म॑ काफी योगदान दै छै ।इ प्लेटफॉर्म व्यक्तिगत आ टीम धन उगाही प्रोफाइल, गतिविधि ट्रैकिंग कें लेल स्ट्रैवा एकीकरण, आ प्रतिस्पर्धा कें प्रोत्साहित करय कें लेल लीडरबोर्ड कें माध्यम सं संलग्नता कें प्रोत्साहित करयत छै.ई एगो सशक्त प्रदर्शन छै कि कोना व्यक्तिगत प्रयास एगो महत्वपूर्ण प्रभाव म॑ विलय करी सकै छै, जेकरा स॑ व्यक्तिगत उपलब्धि क॑ हिमालय केरऽ ट्रस्ट केरऽ समर्थित हिमालय केरऽ दूरस्थ समुदायऽ लेली सामूहिक प्रगति म॑ बदली देलऽ जाय छै ।समिट चैलेंज में भाग लेबय के काज मात्र शारीरिक रूप सं नव ऊंचाई पर पहुंचय के नहिं अछि;ई हर डेग आ हर मीटर के आरोहण के साथ दोसरो के उठाबय के अछि.धावक के रूप में हम अक्सर चुनौती के तलाश करै छियै जे हमरऽ सीमा के परीक्षण करै छै आरू अपनऽ क्षितिज के विस्तार करै छै ।समिट चैलेंज म॑ भाग लेबै लेली फिनिश लाइन स॑ बहुत आगू के कारण म॑ योगदान दै के साथ-साथ ठीक यही करै के अवसर मिलै छै ।यद्यपि मार्च लगभग समाप्त भ गेल अछि, मुदा हिमालय के ट्रस्ट के दान के माध्यम सं समर्थन करय में कहियो देर नहिं होइत अछि.अहां कें योगदान सीधा नेपाल मे हमर शिक्षा, स्वास्थ्य देखभाल, आ पर्यावरणीय कार्यक्रमक कें तरफ जायत छै, जे वास्तविक बदलाव लायत छै.टिप्पणी के लेल फोन करू की अहां कहियो अपन रनिंग के संग फंड रेसिंग चैलेंज में भाग लेने छी?की अहां हिमालयन ट्रस्ट के समिट चैलेंज मे एक साल मे भाग लेने छी?
label: Sports

title: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Goes Missing From Goa Meditation Retreat, Found Two days Later in Hotel - News18
description: Nepal Mayor's Daughter Goes Missing From Goa Meditation Retreat, Found Two days Later in Hotel  News18
publisher.title: News18
full_article:
A 36-year-old woman, the daughter of a mayor in Nepal, who had gone missing from Goa on Monday has been found, police said. The woman, identified as Dhangadhi sub-metropolitan city Mayor Gopal Hamal’s daughter Aarti, was found at a hotel in North Goa’s Mandrem, authorities said. She had been staying at an Osho meditation centre in Goa for the past few months.

According to an NDTV report, Aarti had gone missing on Monday following which Goa police had registered a case and launched a search operation.

Aarti’s father Gopal had said in an X post that he received a message from Aarti’s friend that she had lost contact with her. When the family tried to reach out to her, they also got no response that’s when they alerted the police. Aarti was last seen near Ashwem Beach

“My elder daughter Aarti is an Osho meditator and has been living in Goa for the past few months. However, I received a message from her friend stating that she lost contact with Aarti near Zorba Beach, Ashwem yesterday. I request those living in Goa to assist in the search for my daughter, Aarti,” Gopal Hamal said.

“Also, my younger daughter Arzoo and son-in-law are flying to Goa tonight to look for our elder daughter Aarti,” he added. He also provided contact details for people to come forward and “provide the necessary assistance in the search for my daughter”.

Arzoo said in a Facebook post that according to some callers, her sister was last spotted at a bridge near Siolim.

“We have received more than 500 calls since we left from Nepal to Lucknow. We are still getting calls even post 12:00am. Some of the people have been very helpful and we are eternally grateful to them. According to some callers she was last spotted at a bridge near siolim. Few of them believe that she was taken to a hospital from there in an ambulance as she was found unconscious while the others have been saying that she was taken to the police station,” she wrote.
translated: पुलिस के कहब अछि जे नेपाल के एकटा मेयर के बेटी 36 साल के महिला सोमदिन गोवा सं लापता भ गेल छलीह.अधिकारि सब कहलनि जे, धनगाधी उप-महानगर शहरक मेयर गोपाल के बेटी आर्टी के रूप मे चिन्हित महिला के नॉर्थ गोवा के मंडरेम के एकटा होटल मे भेटल छल।ओ पिछला किछु मास सं गोवा के एकटा ओशो मेडिटेशन सेंटर मे रहैत छलीह.एनडीटीवी केरऽ एगो रिपोर्ट के अनुसार सोमवार क॑ आर्टी लापता होय गेलऽ छेलै, जेकरा बाद गोवा पुलिस न॑ एक मामला दर्ज करी क॑ खोज अभियान शुरू करी देल॑ छेलै ।आर्टी केरऽ पिता गोपाल न॑ एक्स पोस्ट म॑ कहल॑ छेलै कि ओकरा आर्टी केरऽ दोस्त स॑ एगो मैसेज मिललै कि ओकरा स॑ संपर्क नै होय गेलऽ छै ।जखन परिवार हुनका लग पहुंचय के कोशिश केलनि त हुनका सभ के कोनो प्रतिक्रिया सेहो नहि मिलल जखन ओ पुलिस के अलर्ट केलनि.आर्टी क॑ आखिरी बार अश्वेम बीच के पास देखलऽ गेलऽ छेलै “हमरऽ बड़ऽ बेटी आर्टी ओशो केरऽ मध्यस्थ छै आरू पिछला कुछ महीना स॑ गोवा म॑ रह॑ लगलऽ छै ।मुदा, हमरा हुनकर दोस्त सं एकटा संदेश भेटल जे ओ काल्हि अश्वेम के ज़ोरबा बीच के पास आर्टी सं संपर्क गंवा देलनि.हम गोपाल हामाल कहलनि जे, गोपाल हामाल कहलनि जे, गोपाल हामाल कहलनि जे, गोपाल हमल कहलनि।ओ आगू कहलनि जे, संगहि हमर छोट बेटी आर्जू आ जमाय आइ राति अपन पैघ बेटी आर्टी के देखय लेल गोवा के लेल उड़ि रहल अछि।संगहि लोक केँ आगू आबि “हमर बेटीक खोज मे आवश्यक सहायता प्रदान करबाक लेल संपर्क विवरण सेहो देलनि”।आर्जू फेसबुक पोस्ट में कहलनि जे किछु फोन करय वाला के अनुसार हुनकर बहिन के अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल.ओ कहला जे जहिया स हम सब नेपाल स लखनऊ गेल रही तहिया स हमरा सब कए 500 स बेसी फोन आयल अछि।हमरा सब के एखनो 12:00 बजे पोस्ट तक कॉल भेट रहल अछि।किछु लोक बहुत मददगार रहल छथि आ हम सब हुनका सब के अनन्त आभारी छी।किछु फोन करय वाला के अनुसार हुनका अंतिम बेर सिओलिम के पास एकटा पुल पर देखल गेल छल.हुनका सब म॑ स॑ कुछ लोगऽ के मानना ​​छै कि हुनका एम्बुलेंस म॑ एगो अस्पताल ल॑ जायलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, कैन्हेंकि हुनका बेहोश मिललै जबकि बाकी सब कहै छेलै कि हुनका थाना ल॑ जायलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।'
